body: Miyoko Ueda is waifu material. She's just beautiful. That long black hair, that cute face, THOSE HUGE BREASTS FOR GOD'S SAKE. Truly the best girl Koyanagi Royal has ever drawn. It's such a shame that she was relegated to the role of an extra in the latest chapter. Such a waste. I really hope that we'll see her fucking in the spotlight again. *Sigh*
Kyonagi has gathered the essence of eromanga to create this masterpiece series
That MILF with glasses has me splattering all over. Aggressive handjob and slurppppp 😍😍😍😍😍
A world where everyone turns into the Joker when they have sex
